name: mega-aide
description: Things learned and things to remember for my Megacade

scripts.build: npm run build:webapp && npm run neu:update && npm run build:neutralino
scripts.build:neutralino: neu build --release && npm run dist:rename:mac && npm run dist:move
scripts.build:webapp: cd webapp && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run build:resources
scripts.build:resources: npm run resources:copy && npm run resources:write
scripts.dist:clear: rm -rf dist/myapp/mac && rm -rf dist/myapp/windows && rm -rf dist/myapp/linux
scripts.dist:folders: mkdir dist/myapp/mac && mkdir dist/myapp/windows && mkdir dist/myapp/linux
scripts.dist:move: npm run dist:clear && npm run dist:folders && npm run dist:linux && npm run dist:mac && npm run dist:win && npm run dist:resources && npm run dist:dll
scripts.dist:linux: mv dist/myapp/myapp-linux_x64 dist/myapp/linux/myapp-linux_x64 && mv dist/myapp/myapp-linux_arm64 dist/myapp/linux/myapp-linux_arm64 && mv dist/myapp/myapp-linux_armhf dist/myapp/linux/myapp-linux_armhf
scripts.dist:resources: cp dist/myapp/resources.neu dist/myapp/windows/resources.neu && cp dist/myapp/resources.neu dist/myapp/mac/resources.neu && cp dist/myapp/resources.neu dist/myapp/linux/resources.neu && rm dist/myapp/resources.neu
scripts.dist:dll: cp dist/myapp/WebView2Loader.dll dist/myapp/windows/WebView2Loader.dll && cp dist/myapp/WebView2Loader.dll dist/myapp/mac/WebView2Loader.dll && cp dist/myapp/WebView2Loader.dll dist/myapp/linux/WebView2Loader.dll && rm dist/myapp/WebView2Loader.dll
